4239.verse: وَقَالُواْ|And they will say|133|143|760$لِجُلُودِهِمْ|to their skins,|111|130|15261$لِمَ|`Why do|78|97|2974$شَهِدتُّمْ|you testify|92|111|15262$عَلَيْنَا‌ۖ|against us?`|103|122|681$قَالُوٓاْ|They will say,|111|121|101$أَنطَقَنَا ٱللَّهُ|`Allah made us speak,|167|182|15263$ٱلَّذِىٓ|the One Who|107|138|138$أَنطَقَ|makes speak|104|135|15264$كُلَّ|every|57|88|2487$شَىْءٍ|thing;|69|100|186$وَهُوَ|and He|66|82|305$خَلَقَكُمْ|created you|100|123|191$أَوَّلَ|(the) first|85|131|428$مَرَّةٍ|time,|58|104|5847$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|137|2165$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned.|156|179|297$

4241.verse: وَذَٲلِكُمْ|And that|83|104|15271$ظَنُّكُمُ|(was) your assumption|171|214|15272$ٱلَّذِى|which|65|108|138$ظَنَنتُم|you assumed|106|148|15270$بِرَبِّكُمْ|about your Lord.|130|151|3615$أَرْدَٮٰكُمْ|It has ruined you,|138|172|15273$فَأَصْبَحْتُم|and you have become|166|234|3136$مِّنَ|of|50|118|156$ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ|the losers.|116|150|639$

4242.verse: فَإِن|Then if|66|73|227$يَصْبِرُواْ|they endure,|105|120|15274$فَٱلنَّارُ|the Fire|74|89|8417$مَثْوًى|(is) an abode|108|123|13681$لَّهُمْ‌ۖ|for them;|82|97|98$وَإِن|and if|58|73|213$يَسْتَعْتِبُواْ|they ask for favor,|144|151|15275$فَمَا|then not|77|122|132$هُم|they|50|140|49$مِّنَ|(will be) of|91|181|156$ٱلْمُعْتَبِينَ|those who receive favor.|186|231|15276$

4243.verse: ۞ وَقَيَّضْنَا|And We have destined|169|176|15277$لَهُمْ|for them|76|90|98$قُرَنَآءَ|companions|97|111|15278$فَزَيَّنُواْ|(who) made fair-seeming|185|199|15279$لَهُم|to them,|77|91|98$مَّا|what|53|60|262$بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ|(was) before them|143|158|2273$وَمَا|and what|82|111|46$خَلْفَهُمْ|(was) behind them,|149|178|2274$وَحَقَّ|and (is) justified|128|157|15280$عَلَيْهِمُ|against them|106|121|602$ٱلْقَوْلُ|the Word|81|89|8490$فِىٓ|among|63|79|89$أُمَمٍ|nations|68|84|5580$قَدْ خَلَتْ|(that have passed) away|188|204|1225$مِن قَبْلِهِم|before them|107|123|1094$مِّنَ|of|50|66|156$ٱلْجِنِّ|the jinn|70|78|6030$وَٱلْإِنسِ‌ۖ|and the men.|108|156|6041$إِنَّهُمْ|Indeed, they|105|202|106$كَانُواْ|were|69|166|94$خَـٰسِرِينَ|losers.|102|150|3360$

4245.verse: فَلَنُذِيقَنَّ|But surely We will cause to taste|240|256|15284$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|122|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|116|59$عَذَابًا|a punishment|108|140|2933$شَدِيدًا|severe,|74|90|2934$وَلَنَجْزِيَنَّهُمْ|and surely We will recompense them|261|289|10141$أَسْوَأَ|(the) worst|96|152|14983$ٱلَّذِى|(of) what|83|139|138$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|145|94$يَعْمَلُونَ|do.|92|92|912$

4246.verse: ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|77|28$جَزَآءُ|(is the) recompense|153|179|814$أَعْدَآءِ|(of the) enemies|130|156|15285$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah -|93|119|2$ٱلنَّارُ‌ۖ|the Fire;|77|103|762$لَهُمْ|for them|76|89|98$فِيهَا|therein|66|75|253$دَارُ|(is the) home|109|127|6026$ٱلْخُلْدِ‌ۖ|(of) the eternity|129|147|8182$جَزَآءَۢ|(as) recompense|131|149|4954$بِمَا|for what|76|94|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to),|122|131|94$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|of Our Verses,|115|343|408$يَجْحَدُونَ|reject.|104|332|5538$

4247.verse: وَقَالَ|And (will) say|110|118|1089$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|106|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve,|89|106|59$رَبَّنَآ|`Our Lord!|89|106|1167$أَرِنَا|Show us|76|93|4597$ٱلَّذَيْنِ|those who|89|106|15286$أَضَلَّانَا|misled us|83|91|15287$مِنَ|of|50|56|156$ٱلْجِنِّ|the jinn|70|82|6030$وَٱلْإِنسِ|and the men,|108|120|6041$نَجْعَلْهُمَا|(so) we may put them|168|180|15288$تَحْتَ|under|68|80|11341$أَقْدَامِنَا|our feet,|82|94|15289$لِيَكُونَا|that they be|104|110|15290$مِنَ|of|50|311|156$ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ|the lowest.`|103|364|14671$

4247.verse: waqaAla⚓And (will) say⚓V|PERF|LEM:qaAla|ROOT:qwl|3MS★{l~a*iyna⚓those who⚓ REL|LEM:{l~a*iY|MP★kafaruwA@⚓disbelieve,⚓ V|PERF|LEM:kafara|ROOT:kfr|3MP★rab~anaA^⚓`Our Lord!⚓ N|LEM:rab~|ROOT:rbb|M|ACC★>arinaA⚓Show us⚓ V|IMPV|(IV)|LEM:>arayo|ROOT:rAy|2MS★{l~a*ayoni⚓those who⚓ REL|LEM:{l~a*iY|MD★>aDal~aAnaA⚓misled us⚓ V|PERF|(IV)|LEM:>aDal~a|ROOT:Dll|3MD★mina⚓of⚓ P|LEM:min★{lojin~i⚓the jinn⚓ N|LEM:jin~|ROOT:jnn|M|GEN★wa{lo<insi⚓and the men,⚓ N|LEM:<ins|ROOT:Ans|M|GEN★najoEalohumaA⚓(so) we may put them⚓ V|IMPF|LEM:jaEala|ROOT:jEl|1P|MOOD:JUS★taHota⚓under⚓ N|LEM:taHot|ROOT:tHt|ACC★>aqodaAminaA⚓our feet,⚓ N|LEM:qadam|ROOT:qdm|MP|GEN★liyakuwnaA⚓that they be⚓ V|IMPF|LEM:kaAna|ROOT:kwn|SP:kaAn|3MD|MOOD:SUBJ★mina⚓of⚓ P|LEM:min★{lo>asofaliyna⚓the lowest.`⚓ N|LEM:>asofal|ROOT:sfl|MP|GEN★

4239.verse: And they will say to their skins, "Why have you testified against us?" They will say, "We were made to speak by Allah, who has made everything speak; and He created you the first time, and to Him you are returned.

4240.verse: And you were not covering yourselves, lest your hearing testify against you or your sight or your skins, but you assumed that Allah does not know much of what you do.

4241.verse: And that was your assumption which you assumed about your Lord. It has brought you to ruin, and you have become among the losers."

4242.verse: So [even] if they are patient, the Fire is a residence for them; and if they ask to appease [Allah], they will not be of those who are allowed to appease.

4243.verse: And We appointed for them companions who made attractive to them what was before them and what was behind them [of sin], and the word has come into effect upon them among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers.

4244.verse: And those who disbelieve say, "Do not listen to this Qur'an and speak noisily during [the recitation of] it that perhaps you will overcome."

4245.verse: But We will surely cause those who disbelieve to taste a severe punishment, and We will surely recompense them for the worst of what they had been doing.

4246.verse: That is the recompense of the enemies of Allah - the Fire. For them therein is the home of eternity as recompense for what they, of Our verses, were rejecting.

4247.verse: And those who disbelieved will [then] say, "Our Lord, show us those who misled us of the jinn and men [so] we may put them under our feet that they will be among the lowest."
